data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marin, Ivan, Sheibani, Raheleh, Sari, Alireza (2014): A re-description of rare alpheid shrimp Amphibetaeus jousseaumei (Coutière, 1896) and description of a new species of the genus Athanopsis Coutière, 1897 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Alpheidae) from Iranian coast of the Persian Gulf. Zootaxa 3846 (3): 398-410, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3846.3.4
